Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACCU-CHEK Smart Pix accessory enabling data transfer from glucose meters and infusion pumps to computers for diabetes management.
Indications for Use Summary: Enables persons with diabetes or healthcare professionals to send stored data from compatible ACCU-CHEK blood glucose monitors and/or Disetronic/ACCU-CHEK insulin infusion pumps to a computer as reports or data streams for monitoring and clinical management of diabetes.
